description.p: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

description.p: Age. Normal lifespan.
Size. Your size is Medium (tall).
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 ft.
Darkvision: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Natural Weapons: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage instead of the normal bludgeoning damage and have finesse.
Stealth proficiency
Climb speed 30 ft. Advantage on Strength saving throws and Athletics checks when climbing.

Cybernetic enhancements can be applied to any organic species. Choose between a cybernetic arm for increased strength or a cybernetic leg for improved agility.
Cybernetic Enhancement: Choose one - Cybernetic Arm (STR +1) or Cybernetic Leg (DEX +1). If you take both enhancements, you gain vulnerability to ion damage.

Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage instead of the normal bludgeoning damage and have the finesse property.

sheet.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have finesse.

description.p: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.
When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you can drop to 1 hit point instead once per long rest.

sheet.description: +1 HP per level. Once per long rest, when reduced to 0 HP, drop to 1 HP instead.

description.p: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage instead of the normal bludgeoning damage and have the finesse property.

sheet.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage and have finesse.

description.p: You are vulnerable to ion damage.

As an action, you can violently expel air in a 15-foot cone. When you do so, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). A creature takes 2d6 sonic damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. The damage increases to 4d6 at 5th level, 6d6 at 11th level, and 8d6 at 17th level. This ability has no effect on constructs. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you complete a long rest.

sheet.description: Action: Expel air in a 15-ft cone. WIS save DC 8 + prof + CON for 2d6 sonic damage (half on success). Scales with level. Uses = prof bonus, long rest.

description.p: As a bonus action, you can quickly repair some damage on your body. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your level. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

sheet.description: Bonus Action: Regain 1d10 + level HP. Short/long rest recharge.

description.p: You have advantage on Investigation checks.
You have advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

sheet.description: Advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

description.p: You can take the Hide or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

description.p: You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. Your flying speed is halved when wearing medium or heavy armor.
